import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import destination from '../Assets/img/destination.svg'; import home from '../Assets/img/warehouse.svg' import Delivery from './delivery'; function TableView(props) { const apiData = props.data.shipments; const delivery = props.data.scan; let line = { position: 'absolute', zIndex: -1, top: 20, bottom: 200 - delivery.length*38, borderLeft: '2px dashed rgb(12, 228, 48)' }; return (
{delivery.map((item) => ( ))}
{apiData.map((item) => ( item.scan? useState(item.scan):[]}> ))}
AWB NUMBER TRANSPORTER SOURCE DESTINATION BRAND START DATE ETD STATUS
#{item.awbno} {item.carrier} {item.from} {item.to} {item.carrier} {item.pickup_date} {item.extra_fields?item.extra_fields.expected_delivery_date:""} {item.current_status}
); } export default TableView;
